TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 276
TEI.2.document_title: John Austin to Stephen F Austin, 10-28-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: John Austin to Austin, October 28, 1829. Trade in mules and horses with New Orleans.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 276

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*John Austin to Austin, October 28, 1829. Trade in mules and horses with New Orleans.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Dr Sir*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr McConnell*/person_mentioned* will start in a few days for *location_mentioned*N. Orleans*/location_mentioned* with a drove of horses and mules I wish to send by him three mules which I have here and the two you have at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Buckner*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* if you will give an order to *person_mentioned*Mess McConnell*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Blair */person_mentioned*they will receive the mules at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Cooper*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* place *location_mentioned*on the peach Creek a few miles above *person_mentioned*Mr Hope*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* I intend to deliver the three there, if they will give 35$ each I intend to take it for mine if you will take the same write to me by *person_mentioned*Mr. Blair*/person_mentioned* and I will take their draft on *person_mentioned*J. W. Collins*/person_mentioned*, for the amount. I will Come to town in a few days perhaps about the middle of next week, I have got some cloth for two pair of pantaloons for you *person_mentioned*Eliza */person_mentioned*is making them I will bring them up when I come*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Brasoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="10-28-1829">Octr 28th 1829*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. S F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
